products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S21 is a flagship smartphone with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a 64 MP triple camera system, and a 4000 mAh battery.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air
products.description: Apple MacBook Air is a thin and light laptop with a 13.3-inch Retina display, an Apple M1 chip, and a Touch ID sensor.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: Sony PlayStation 5 is a powerful game console with an ultra-high speed SSD, a 4K UHD Blu-ray drive, and a DualSense wireless controller.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort
products.description: Bose QuietComfort 35 II is a wireless headphone with noise cancelling technology, a built-in Google Assistant, and a battery life of up to 20 hours.

products.name: Kindle Paperwhite
products.description: Kindle Paperwhite is an e-reader with a 6-inch glare-free display, a built-in adjustable light, and a waterproof design.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S24 is a flagship smartphone with a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a 64 MP triple camera system, and a 4000 mAh battery.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air2
products.description: Apple MacBook Air2 is a thin and light laptop with a 13.3-inch Retina display, an Apple M1 chip, and a Touch ID sensor.
